title: Genesis
description: Rowan The virus is spreading. There are less humans and more infected than ever. Humanity is on the brink of extinction. But this isn’t the end. This is just the beginning. Of what, I don’t know but it’s something big. Now if only I can focus on the point at hand instead of this mountain of a man, who distracts me on a regular basis. But this push and pull we have going on is fun. Wonder how long it will take to break him. Tripp I hate change. Change is what destroyed us. But if we have any chance of survival, it’s gonna take a whole lot of change. And maybe a miracle. Though I didn’t expect the miracle to come in the form of a 5’5 raven-haired beauty. With a smart mouth and the ability to test my patience like no other. Between her defiance and banging muscular body, I have to learn to focus with the head on my shoulders and not the one in my pants. She’s determined to break me. But, what my little Kitty Cat doesn’t know is I’m determined to win this battle and make her purr.
author: N.M. Black
